meanings.definition: A person who prescribes, especially a physician or other healthcare professional.
meanings.sent1: The prescribers at the clinic recommended a new medication for the patient.
meanings.sent2: The prescribers carefully consider the best treatment options for their patients.
meanings.sent3: The prescribers joked that they should prescribe some sunshine for better health.
meanings.sent4: The prescribers' words were like healing potions, bringing relief to those in need.
meanings.sent5: The prescribers' expertise in medicine made them highly respected in the community.

meanings.definition: Those who recommend or specify something.
meanings.sent1: The prescribers of the book club suggested a thrilling mystery novel for the next read.
meanings.sent2: The prescribers of the diet plan emphasized the importance of balanced meals.
meanings.sent3: The prescribers of the travel itinerary proposed an adventurous hike up the mountain.
meanings.sent4: The prescribers of the safety guidelines outlined the necessary precautions to take.
meanings.sent5: The prescribers of the new technology advised on the best practices for implementation.
